entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:57 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 09:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -20.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -26.4°C
Wind: E 69 km/h gust 80 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 30 km/h except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:58 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Wind becoming light before morning. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:58 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:58 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
